environment: the land scorched by relentless heat and orange flame-light

npc.name: The Narrator
dialogue: In the heart of The Burning End, The Scorcher awaits, his flames licking the very air you breathe.
Two guardians have fallen, their echoes whispering warnings from the ashes.
This is your final stand for freedom, hero. Prepare to face the inferno that seeks to consume all.

lore.title: The Burning End
lore.content: The Shade is gone. The realm trembles. In desperation, it unleashes its final guardian: The Scorcher, a being of pure destruction. The prison would rather burn than release you. This is the last trial. Defeat The Scorcher, and the barrier shatters. You will finally be free.
